name: Designs
author: UXL Themes

sections.description:
A collection of WordPress site designs using only block themes.

License

Licensed under the GNU General Public License v2.0,
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’.
  2. Search for ‘designs’ and install the plugin.
  3. Activate ‘Designs’ from your Plugins page.

Navigate to Appearance > Designs where you will be able to preview and activate any of the included site designs.
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Now what do I do?

Navigate to Appearance > Designs where you will be able to preview and activate any of the included site designs.

What exactly are these designs?

Block themes – sometimes also known as Full Site Editing or FSE themes – enable you to use the site editor where you can customize colors, backgrounds, fonts, spacing, layout, block positioning and much more. These designs are site editor customizations that you can use as a starting point for your own site design, or simply use one of the included designs exactly as it is. After activating a design, you can continue customizing your site just as much or as little as you wish.

What happens to my existing content?

All your existing page/post content is unaffected, and will not be modified or changed in any way when you activate one of the included designs.

I activated a design and now I realize I don’t like it. What can I do?

Whenever you activate a design, a restore point is created. Navigate to Appearance > Designs > Restore where you will be able to restore your site design to exactly how it was before you activated the design.
